file_content.text:
Enter the queue to battle alongside ally players against enemy players in warzones scattered across the galaxy. Once a match is made, you will be called to arms in one of the following warzones:
ALDERAAN CIVIL WAR
<<1>>
Republic and Empire transport ships converge at an important orbital defense facility. Gain control of the facility's air defense cannons, turn them on the enemy ship, and shoot it down!
Game Mode: 3-point Domination
THE VOIDSTAR
<<2>>
You are part of a boarding party seeking out prototype technology on a long lost derelict starship. One faction defends the ship's datacore while the other attempts to retrieve it, planting bombs on doors in an attempt to find a route toward the core of the ship.
Game Mode: Assault (2 Rounds)
HUTTBALL
Anything goes in this brutal spectator sport run by the Hutts. Two teams fight in a no-holds-barred event where the object is to grab the Huttball and get it to the opposing team's goal line.
Game Mode: Bombing Run
You are in queue for a PvP warzone as a group with:
You are in queue for a PvP warzone
You are not queued for a PvP warzone
Click here to access the scoreboard
You are currently not in a group. Players can queue up for and enter normal Warzones freely while still in a Team Ranked Warzone queue. Your team will not lose their place in queue.
You are currently part of an Ops group
Your group must be made up of players who are in the same level bracket.
Queue for both Ranked and regular Warzones at the same time!

Enter the queue to battle alongside ally players against enemy players in Warzones scattered across the galaxy. Once a match is made, you will be called to arms in one of the following Warzones:
ALDERAAN CIVIL WAR
<<1>>
Republic and Empire transport ships converge at an important orbital defense facility. Gain control of the facility's air defense cannons, turn them on the enemy ship, and shoot it down!
Game Mode: 3-point Domination
THE VOIDSTAR
<<2>>
You are part of a boarding party seeking out prototype technology on a long lost derelict starship. One faction defends the ship's datacore while the other attempts to retrieve it, planting bombs on doors in an attempt to find a route toward the core of the ship.
Game Mode: Assault (2 Rounds)
HUTTBALL
<<3>>
Anything goes in this brutal spectator sport run by the Hutts. Two teams fight in a no-holds-barred event where the object is to grab the Huttball and get it to the opposing team's goal line.
Game Mode: Huttball
NOVARE COAST
<<4>>
The invasion of Denova has begun as the armies of the Empire and Republic clash on the Novare Coast. Vie for control over the coast's powerful artillery emplacements and use them to cut off your enemy's reinforcements until the Novare Coast remains firmly under your control.
Game Mode: Majority 3-point Domination
ANCIENT HYPERGATE
<<5>>
Elite forces of the Republic and Empire are battling to capture and activate an ancient Gree hypergate complex on the planet Seline. Seize control of energy pylons at either end of the complex and direct their power toward your team's hypergate to claim victory. But be cautious: each time power is transferred from the pylons, they emit a deadly energy blast-only the central bunker is safe from these discharges!
Game Mode: Convergence
RANKED WARZONES:
Ranked Warzones offer more competitive matches and greater rewards. Only groups of exactly eight level 70 characters can queue up as a team for Ranked Warzones. After a Ranked Warzone has ended, each players' Team Rating will be adjusted individually based on the outcome of the match and the ratings of all other players participating. Players are awarded Ranked Warzone commendations based on performance; you can use these commendations to purchase the best PvP gear.
Players in a queue for a Team Ranked Warzone can still queue up for normal Warzones solo or as a group of up to four. You can freely enter and play normal Warzones without losing your team's place in the Ranked Warzone queue.
This is Pre-Season One of Ranked Warzones.
You need to complete <<1>> more Ranked Warzone matches before receiving your first rating.
Rating is an approximate measure of your success in Ranked Warzones relative to other players on your server. It is adjusted at the end of every Ranked Warzone match.
You are currently part of a group that has too many members to queue for a ranked match
Group composition is too low to queue for an arena ranked match.
You need to be in an a group of 4 level 70 players in order to participate in group Ranked Warzone Arenas.
Cannot queue with offline party members
Cannot group queue warzones while in queue for the activity finder.
Cannot queue for this content while engaged in activity finder content.
You must be level 70 in order to participate in Ranked Arenas.
You have <<1>> of <<2>> weekly Warzone participations remaining.
You have <<1>> remaining on your Warzone Weekly Pass.
<<1>> has not yet downloaded the full version of the game. You may not queue with them until they have completed the download.
You may not queue for Warzones until the full version of the game has been fully downloaded.
You are already in a warzone queue. You must leave queue before queueing for a different warzone.

Do battle in Warzones across the galaxy! Join solo or with a group of four allies. Work together strategically to emerge victorious over the opposing team. Leave none standing!
Rewards: EXP, CXP, Credits and Unassembled Components.

Gather a team or go it alone as you represent the Frog-Dogs or Rotworms. Test your mettle against teams of four players in Arena matches! The Last Team Standing in this best of three rounds deathmatch wins!
Rewards: Commendations, CXP, Credits and Unassembled Components.
You are in queue for a Starfighter battle.
You are not queued for a Starfighter battle.
The following additional rewards will be granted:
You must have a Valor rank of at least <<1>> before queueing for Ranked Warzones.
Cannot queue a group with members of mixed factions.
You are not in a Warzone queue.
You are not in a Starfighter queue.
You are not able to participate in this type of Warzone.
